text: Johan Hammond Rosbach (22 August 1921 – 7 September 2004) was a Norwegian author and Esperantist. == Bibliography == His best known work, Fianĉo de l'Sorto, (Dansk Esperanto Forlag) 1977, was listed among notable Esperanto works. An English translation by E. J. Lieberman was approved by him and will be published as "Fiancé of Fate." == External links == * Johan Hammond Rosbach at NRK Authors Category:Norwegian Esperantists Category:Norwegian male writers Category:1921 births Category:2004 deaths
title: Johan Hammond Rosbach
